body:
Hello everyone,
I have kept this on my mind for so long now. I still remember the lobby of this server when I first started playing and I wanted to know if any of you recognize it and if you knew when this lobby was in use. It was a lobby where only you were present and you have speed 3. As I remember, it was mostly made of sandstone. It was also very small. I tried to recreate it (images below,) however it's probably not very accurate. Any of you recognize it and if so when was this? (Sorry for big images)
body_tagged:

title: Anyone remember this?

replies.body: It's the MCZone lobby. ;) Avicus used it for a little while, always loved the secret spot.
replies.body_tagged: It's the MCZone lobby. ;) Avicus used it for a little while, always loved the secret spot.

replies.body: If I recall correctly, it was stone brick, wasn't it? And then they made that bigger stone brick lobby. Nice remake though, it's actually pretty accurate as far as I know.
replies.body_tagged: If I recall correctly, it was stone brick, wasn't it? And then they made that bigger stone brick lobby. Nice remake though, it's actually pretty accurate as far as I know.

replies.body: I do remember that lobby however that one came after the one I was trying to recreate.
replies.body_tagged: I do remember that lobby however that one came after the one I was trying to recreate.

replies.body: i remember. that was a sick lobby.
replies.body_tagged: i remember. that was a sick lobby.

replies.body: Destroy The Monument Sign I think was renamed to NEBULA
replies.body_tagged: Destroy The Monument Sign I think was renamed to NEBULA

replies.body: I remember that! I think it was stone brick and had some void blocks that you couldn't walk on in the corner areas.
replies.body_tagged: I remember that! I think it was stone brick and had some void blocks that you couldn't walk on in the corner areas.
